snippet: Gov. Doug Ducey is calling for an investigation into unrest at a privately run state prison that left it heavily damaged and led to the transfer of more than 1,000 inmates.
lead_paragraph: Gov. Doug Ducey is calling for an investigation into unrest at a privately run state prison that left it heavily damaged and led to the transfer of more than 1,000 inmates.

headline.main: Arizona: Inquiry Sought Over Prison Rioting
headline.print_headline: Arizona: Inquiry Sought Over Prison Rioting
